branding.tagline: Discover the undiscovered in web comics

publishing_focus.primary_focus: Web comics from independent and emerging artists, across various genres
publishing_focus.target_audience: Web comic fans who enjoy discovering new talent, aged 13 and above
publishing_focus.competitive_advantage: We scout for and nurture promising comic artists, offering fresh and diverse content not available elsewhere
publishing_focus.example_titles: Titles similar to 'Sarah's Scribbles' and 'Questionable Content'; artists akin to Sarah Andersen
